rooms.description: Open space that welcomes guests; includes a small vestibule and storage area for coats.
Spacious living area with open views towards the rooftop terrace; includes seating arrangements and built-in entertainment unit.
Open dining space adjacent to the living room, designed for casual family meals.
Private bedroom with en-suite bathroom; includes ample natural light through strategically placed windows on the east side.
Additional bedroom for guests; designed with a balcony overlooking the terrace and garden.
Functional kitchen area integrated with dining space; includes an island counter and ample storage, ensuring smooth traffic flow from the entrance hall.
Storage area for appliances and cleaning supplies; positioned close to the kitchen for ease of access.
